attributes.action: stop our personal information being held by overseas agencies, (i.e. India)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, a major credit company, based in Nottingham and in the USA, announced that IT jobs would be going to India rather than be based in the UK. This means that personal data will be available to persons that are not governed by the same stringent data protection laws as they are at present. Considering the recent embarrassment caused by data going missing here and Indian callcentre employees history of misuse of personal data, should this not be stopped ?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
